action.text: Amendment SA 1717 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1717 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 301.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 302(f) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1717.
Amendment SA 1717 proposed by Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 1618. (consideration: 12/01/17 CR S7707-7711; text: 12/01/17 CR S7707) To strike title II.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1717 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 301.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1717 proposed by Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 1618.
